android.title: IMPORTANT read this first
android.message: We have changed USDT block-chain from OMNI to ERC-20 standards. Make sure the wallet that you use to deposit supports ERC-20. Please note OMNI deposit wallet will not be supported. If you have done a deposit please contact support.
